regex.name: server

regex.name: resolver
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re ,requests import urlresolver def parseint(string): return int(''.join([x for x in string if x.isdigit()]))
def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
values = re.search(r'service=="[server.param1]"\)\{h=dec\("(.*?)"\)\+dec\("(.*?)"', page_data, re.DOTALL) var1=values.group(1) var2=values.group(2) var1+=''.join(' ') var1+=''.join(var2) str=var1 d = "" ; str = str.split(" ") i=0 for i in range(0,len(str)): pp=(parseint(str[i])-7) d+=''.join(unichr(pp))
streamLink = urlresolver.resolve(d) return streamLink
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:19.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/19.0
